pkgmetadata.longdescription: Persistence Terrace for Topological Data Analysis // Plot the summary graphic called the persistence terrace for topological inference. It also provides the aid tool called the terrace area plot for determining the number of significant topological features. Moon, C., Giansiracusa, N., and Lazar, N. A. (2018) doi:10.1080/10618600.2017.1422432.
